alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 13 at 4:43PM PDT until September 13 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... East Central Lincoln County in south central Nevada... * Until 745 PM PDT. * At 443 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated a complex of thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pioche, Ursine, Cathedral Gorge State Park, Panaca, Echo Canyon State Park, Meadow Valley Campground, Horsethief Gulch Campground, Eagle Valley and Ranch Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
